title: ONE FOR ALL OP's
body:
Tanks are OP really. 
I have not lost a game or beaten these champs:
Galio**
Mao***
Malphite***
Alistar****
Singed**
The early game can be a bit bad but once you hit about 2 items and or lvl 11 you win easily.
Also surprisingly Viktor was very good. I carried a Viktor game vs Caits with this build.
{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}}
